name: Fortune Follow: The Mansion
description:
Fortune Follow is an exciting game that will take you through an atmosphere of terror and suspense as you solve challenging puzzles to advance through diferent rooms.

In this game, you'll find yourself chasing a myth about an unknown mansion located within a mountain. To do so, you must explore each room and find the key that will allow you to advance to the next one. However, be careful: each room is full of dangers and traps that you'll have to overcome.

With each room you pass, you'll get closer to the truth behind the mysterious mansion. Will you be able to find all the keys and escape the mansion before it's too late? Discover the secrets that the mansion hides and put your puzzle-solving skills to the test in this exciting horror game!

Features

  • Interactive puzzles
  • Realistic graphics
  • Shocks and chases
  • Variety of rooms
